comment: love the app, but there are some things that are annoying. When you go back onto the homepage not too long after, your feed resets automatically, not being able to find the pins before it restarted, nothing. It's annoying because it automatically decides to refresh my page without me doing so and not being able to browse the pins I'd like. Pinterest also sent me several emails saying they've removed pins from my board and ones I've created, and doesn't show which pins or lets me send an appeal.
key sentence: When you go back onto the homepage not too long after, your feed resets automatically, and you are not able to find the pins from before it restarted.
the function of activity: Activity involves searching, accessing menus, filtering, viewing various content categories, managing pins, profiles, settings, creating, sharing, and navigating within the interface.
